org.opends.server.replication.service

Class ReplicationBroker.ReplicationServerInfo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.replication.service.ReplicationBroker.ReplicationServerInfo
  • Enclosing class:
    ReplicationBroker

    public static class ReplicationBroker.ReplicationServerInfo
extends java.lang.Object
    Bag class for keeping info we get from a replication server in order to compute the best one to connect to. This is in fact a wrapper to a ReplServerStartMsg (V3) or a ReplServerStartDSMsg (V4). This can also be updated with a info coming from received topology messages or monitoring messages.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      ReplicationBroker.ReplicationServerInfo(RSInfo rsInfo, java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> connectedDSs)
      Constructs a new replication server info with the passed RSInfo internal values and the passed connected DSs.
